description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions and installation of 2no. rooflights to front roofslope
decision_conditions: The proposed hip to gable roof extension by virtue of its size, siting and design would create an incongruous addition to the host property that would unbalance the roof symmetry of the terrace it forms part of and would detract form the character and appearance of the host property and the terrace it forms part of and be visually intrusive the streetscene and detract from the character and appearance of the wider area. The proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The works proposed are acceptable and will not have an adverse effect on the tree or reduce its amenity value. Recommendation: Approve tree surgery work.
